attributes.additional_details: This petition's ultimate goal is to pass a law which means football chairman and owners cannot change their teams club colours, club badge and the club name. Whatever rivalries we have with clubs we don't support, i think we are all in agreement that Cardiff playing in red is a farce. Changing Hull City FC's name is a joke. If fans from the premier league to Southern Skrill Premier unite we can ensure the future of our clubs is the one we want.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association.
